transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haanji madam.

Customer: Haanji haanji main Simran ji bol rahi hu.

Executive: Ji kya keh rahe ho?

Customer: Haanji mere ko iske bare mein discussion karna tha na aapki jo lead aapne you know mark kari thi not satisfied. Sorry jo aapne mark kari thi not relevant.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Haan to usi ke upar discussion karna tha.

Customer: Ki aapko kuch locations hongi na didi.

Customer: Kuch locations hongi jahan ki aapko lead nahi chahiye hongi, kuch products hongi jahan se aapko lead nahi chahiye hongi, aapne not interested mark kiya tha.

Executive: To aap please mujhe bataiye aap.

Customer: Haanji.

Customer: Haanji boliye.

Customer: Haanji haanji boliye.

Executive: Please bataiye.

Customer: Accha main bas aapko wahi bol rahi thi ki ye jo location hai, main bas aapko kuch location ke naam puchungi aap mere ko bata dena aap idhar deal karte ho ya nahi aur kuch products ke, theek hai?

Customer: Hum ye dekh lete hai uske baad main aapko meeting bulati hu main kuch kuch add karwati hu aur kuch kuch filters lagwati hu aapke tak ki aapki leads mein hai, theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai. Makrana Jalandhar?

Executive: Makrana mein nahi karte.

Customer: Theek hai. Aap retail leads mein bhi kaam nahi karte?

Customer: Hai na?

Executive: Nahi.

Customer: Retail leads mein bhi aap kaam nahi karte bas wholesale hi aati hai aapko.

Customer: Theek hai. To bas ye do products aur main puchh leti hu kya ho gaya. Marble border tiles?

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi karte.

Customer: Theek hai. White marble temple mein to aap karte hai right?

Executive: Ji haan.

Customer: To actually aapko ek lead aayi thi. Ye Jaipur Rajasthan ki thi. Theek hai main aapko ek kaam karti hu. Main meeting pe hi leti hu aap call karega mere ko bataiyega aapki aapke kuch link aayi hai, theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai aap system pe hai na abhi?

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Haanji baki aap aise thoda update de sakte hai mere ko kaise chal rahi hai services?

Customer: Haanji?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haanji main update puchh rahi thi aapko kaise lag raha hai kaise chal rahi hai aapki services?

Executive: Services to abhi lead vagera to aa hi nahi hai do din ho gaye.

Customer: Do do din nahi aayi to aise thodi hai karti. Bilkul ab har din 15 20 25 kar denge ye jitni denge.

Customer: Ye hoga ki aap isko sari ki sari consume kar sakte hai depending upon ki aapke paas availability kitni hai by the time aapke paas aayi.

Customer: To matlab jab se aapne start kiya hai aapne kitne ka conversion kar liya hoga abhi tak?

Executive: Abhi tak to ek lakh rupya ek lakh rupya ka business aaya hai.

Executive: To usme bhi to.

Customer: Wo to hota hai business chalane mein to hota hi hai. Par abhi aapko hue bhi to do teen mahine hi hai.

Executive: Ji ji pata hai baat.

Customer: Theek hai. Aapka accha theek hai. Aapko link aayi hai kya?

Executive: Ji join kar liya hai maine.

Customer: Aap yahan pe system ka kya naam hai block kar dijiye. System ki voice block kar dijiye call ki wajah se. Theek hai? Kyunki aapko yahan pe aawaz aa rahi hogi system mein yahan pe yahan pe join karti hu. Main screen share kar rahi hu.

Customer: Theek hai?

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Main screen share kar rahi hu.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Hai kya? Theek hai. Aapka main theek hai. Aapki profile ye rahi value search ki ye do. Maine jo aapko order request press karwaya tha wo aap use karte ho?

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Theek hai. Aur aap pan India to kaam nahi karte right?

Executive: Nahi karte.

Customer: Karte hai ya nahi karte?

Customer: Isme aap mujhe bataiyega ye lead humne adjust kar rahe hai ya nahi? Kaise buyer ke paas mark karte honge ye log? Isko bhi samajh lijiye aap.

Customer: Kaise kyun kaam aate hai aap?

Customer: Main isko Facebook pe dalungi Facebook pe dalungi. Isko mujhe bhi aapko hai lead hi nahi hai, theek hai? Aapke kya discussion hai? Ayurvedic category mein in leader bhi chala do. Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan aur wo aur category mein lead aati hai Rajasthan ki.

Executive: Aage aawaz saaf nahi aa rahi.

Customer: Theek hai ruko ruko main kya naam hai system se connect karti hu ek second.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss leads marked as not relevant.

- Wants to know about locations and products of interest.

- Executive says leads are not coming for 2 days.

- Wants to know about conversion rate since start.

- Voice not clear.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to discuss leads.

- Executive asked to block system voice due to call.

- Executive informed that leads will be increased.

- Executive shared the screen.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after receiving the link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, locations, products, services, conversion
